tera mra kya karega sanam jamaana
roke toh koyi hum daud ke milenge
deewaar julm ki hum td 
milenge ta ra ra ra 
aaja tujhe pyaar kar loon o jaanejaana
tera mera kya karega sanam jamaana
kal tak thi main jahaan ki 
abb dulhan hoon main saiyaan teri 
abb jaaye praan chaahe jiya 
na chhodungi main baiyaan teri 
abb tak toh chali hai 
mein deewaano ki matwaalon ki 
haq leke rahenge apana jai bolo 
dilwaalon ki ta ra ra ra 
aaja tujhe pyaar kar loon o jaanejaana
tera mera kya karega sanam jamaana
itana bhaari sheher toh hai 
chhupkar milane ki jagah nahi 
waapas kyun hum chale wahaan 
ulfat karane ki jagah nahi 
yeh pyaar ki dushman 
basti se dur nikalake 
chaahe koi hamein kahe 
jungle mein rahenge chalake 
aaja aaja aaja tujhe 
kar loon o jaanejaana 
tera mera kya karega sanam jamaana

aa tere balo me yeh phul laga du
ke aisa phul phir naa khilega
jab tere dil se han 
tere dil se ho

teree kasam bas maja aa jayega
dolegee dharatee aur ambar hilega
aisa premee phir naa

bhi ja kyo der itani kari 
o nilam pari ruth jaungi

aati hu aati hu dam lo ghadi 
bhi ja kyo der itani kari

ja ri sapno kee nilam pari

gori o gori prem kar 
aisa premi phir na milega

ki wanar sena sath chali

pyaar kee pyaas pyaar kee pyaas
kya dharatee aur kya 
sabako pyaar kee pyaas 
pyaar kee pyaas pyaar kee pyaas
sarita ko sagar kee pyaas 
me laharo aa vaas 
laharen uth uth jaana chaahe 
ke chanda ke paas 
mann se mann ko har 
ko ek aas vishvas 
pyaar kee pyaas pyaar kee pyaas
pahalee kiran ko chhukar ke 
chaman kaa khil jaata hai 
ek pyaar ke chumban se 
patthar bhee hil jaata hai 
jug jug ke pyaase chatak 
ek bund kee aas 
pyaar kee pyaas pyaar kee pyaas
laakho taaro kee aankhe raat 
bhar bhar aatee hain 
bhor bhaye toh kaliyo par 
jhar jhar jaatee hai 
paran kaa patjhad pal 
dhundhe jivan kaa madhumas 
pyaar kee pyaas pyaar kee pyaas
pyaasa pyaasa jag saara 
jag kee har dhaara 
maha pyaar kee pyaas liye pyaasa khud shrijanahara
pyaas kee dharatee par 
ne likha shrishtee itihaas 
pyaar kee pyaas pyaar kee pyaas

Koi jo mila to mujhe aisa lagta tha
Jaise meri saari duniya main geeton ki rut aur
Rangon ki barkha hai khushbu ki aandhi hai
Mahki hui si ab saari fizaayen hain
Bahki hui si ab saari hawaayen hain
Khoyi hui si ab saari dishaayen hain
Badli hui si ab saari adaayen hain
Jaagi umangein hain, dhadak raha hai dil
Saanson main toofaan hain, hothon pe nagme hain
Aakhon main sapne hain, sapnon main beete hue
Sare vo saare lamhe hain

Jab koi aaya tha, nazron pe chhaya tha
Dil main samaya tha, kaise main bataun tumhe
Kaise use paaya tha, pyaare se chehre pe bikhri jo julphen
To aisa lagta tha jaise kohre ke peechhe
Ek os main dhula hua phool khila hai
Jaise badal main ik chaand chhupa hai
Aur jhaank raha hai jaise raat ke parde main
Ek savera hai roshan roshan aakhon main
Sapnon ka saagar jisme prem sitaron ki 
Chaadar jaise jhalak rahi hai
Lahron lahron baat kare to jaise moti barse

Jaise kahin chandi ki payal goonjey
Jaise kahin sheeshe main jaam girey
Aur chhann se tootey jaise koi chhip ke sitaar bajaye
Jaise koi chaandni raat main gaye
Jaise koi hole se paas bulaye
Kaisi meethi baatain thi
Vo kaisi mulakaatein thi
Vo jab maine jaana tha
Nazron se kaise pighalte hain dil
Aur aarzoo paati hai kaise manzil
Aur kaise utarta hai chaand jameen par
Kaise kabhi lagta hai swarg agar hai
To bas hai yahin par

Usne bataya mujhe, aur samjhaya mujhe
Hum jo mile hain, hamein aise hi milna tha
Gul jo khile hain, unhe aise hi khilna tha
Janmo ke bandhan, janmo ke rishtey hain
Jabhi hum janme to hum yahin milte hain
Kaanon main mere jaise, shahed sa ghulne lage
Khwaabon ke dar jaise aakhon main khulne lage
Khwaabon ki duniya bhi kitni haseen aur
Kaisi rangeen thee khwaabon ki duniya
Jo kahne ko thee par kahin bhi nahi thee
Khwaab jo toote mere, aakh jo khuli meri
/
Hosh jo aaya mujhe
Maine dekha maine jaana
Vo jo kabhi aaya tha, nazron pe chhaya tha
Dil main samaya tha, ja bhi chuka hai
Aur dil mera hai ab tanha tanha
Na to koi armaan hai, na koi tamanna hai
Aur na koi sapna hai
Ab jo mere din aur ab jo meri raatein hain
Unmain sirf aansoon hain

Aur fariyaadein hain
